title: The Politician's love story
creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
brief_description: When a corrupt politician discovers that a satirical cartoon in the newspaper was created by a rather pretty young female cartoonist his anger soon turns into lust. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Kathlyn Williams, Marion Leonard, Florence Lawrence, D.W. Griffith. Silent film with no intertitles.
